RelatedSentence: The population of Pacific City more than quadrupled May 17 when cyclists arrived at Cape Kiwanda to join in the 24th - annual Reach the Beach fundraiser for the American Lung Association of Oregon .
Many were greeted by crowds of friends and family - making for lots of people .
